mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qh_user_suggestion(user_id, user_email, user_suggestion, suggest_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{email}, #{suggestion}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT qu.nickname as nickname, qh.email as userEmail, qus.user_email as email, qus.user_suggestion as suggestion, qus.suggest_time as suggestTime FROM qh_user_suggestion qus JOIN qh_user qu ON qus.user_id=qu.user_id ORDER BY suggest_time DESC
